data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Do you think it would be more fair or less fair for a computer to grade your school essays? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: I don't think I would feel too good about a computer grading my essays as a computer could not measure reasoning, adequacy of evidence, good sense, ethical stance, convincing argument, the meaningful organization in your essay. Even though teachers take much more time to give back feedback, the feedback is more meaningful as they could understand the reasoning of the essays much better. I believe a computer would be able to give me effective feedback, but it wouldn't have been as effective as teachers' feedback.（85 字）
